attributes.action: A second EU referendum 2% is to small for such a big decision. Include under 18s
attributes.additional_details: The majority of MPs back the remain campaign and the majority of the current and younger generations. A truthful campaign based on the facts should be run now that the £350 million figure has been proved false.
attributes.background: The Brexit campaign was not truthful with many voters regretting their decision now the reality is upon us. The older retired generation have made a decision for the young but the win is not clear enough. We need to run again and include more young people in the vote with a clear margin of victory.
